bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of obstructed nutrition among children experiencing tidal fever and emaciation with their spleen and stomach being in a state of depletion weakness. Lu xin jing 顱囟經 Fj: 孩子無故肚大項細，四肢消瘦，筋脈骨節弛緩，是小來少乳，嚼食與 吃，早成骨熱疳勞 , “Without apparent reason children develop an enlarged abdomen and a narrow nape. Their four limbs are emaciated; the sinews, vessels, and joints slacken. This is because they have been weaned early and were offered food to chew instead. Hence they early develop bone heat and gan -illness with exhaustion ”.
